itunes:title: FEB 23 2022 - CBS SPREADS DISINFORMATION
title: FEB 23 2022 - CBS SPREADS DISINFORMATION
description:
CBS spreads disinformation on the Ukraine crisis by claiming they are to blame for the US inflation, Rebel News speaks with Candice Sero, who was trampled by the RCMP while peacefully protesting mask mandates in Ottawa, and DC Mayor Bowser plans on deploying 800 National Guard troops in response to the Freedom Convoy that is starting in California and heading to DC, meanwhile a Chinese news outlet accidentally leaked its ‘instructions’ on the Russian-Ukraine coverage.

Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
